preferences.description: The base URL for your Zendesk support center. When viewing your support articles online, the URL will be in the format https://support.mycompany.com/hc/en-us/articles/3600000000000-My-Article-Title. The base URL is everything after the https:// and before the /hc/ part of the URL.
